channel.title: visualización on Dominic Royé
channel.description: Recent content in visualización on Dominic Royé

item.title: Introducción a los SIG con R
Clima y tiempo
item.description: Probability of a summer day (maximum temperature greater than 25ºC) through the year in Australia. Data: SILO. Probability of a frost day (minimum temperature less than 0ºC) through the year in Europe. Data: E-OBS 18e. Probability of a frost day (minimum temperature less than 0ºC/32ºF) through the year in the Contiguous United States. Data: PRISM. Platform: Google Earth Engine. Este noviembre 2019 ha sido extraordinariamente nublado.

item.title: Geografía
item.description: Our research found that, in most Mediterranean European countries, the amount of burnt area is increasingly related with a lower number of #wildfires. I estimated ad hoc the same index for NSW Australia with similar results. More: article. Our research found that, in most Mediterranean European countries, the amount of burnt area is increasingly related with a lower number of #wildfires. I estimated ad hoc the same index for California with similar results.
